means: 对（事实）歪曲，对（文章等）断章取义，窜改( garble的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He gave a garbled account of what had happened.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对所发生事情的叙述含混不清。

sentence.Network_en: The Coastguard needs to decipher garbled messages in a few minutes.
sentence.Network_cn: 海岸警卫队需要在几分钟内解读这些含混不清的信息。

sentence.Network_en: Without him they forgot their cues and garbled their lines.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦没有了他,她们就忘掉了她们的结尾语,或者弄错了台词.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Finnish noodle ... daub 涂抹 garbled 乱码 brevity 简短.
以g开头的英语英文单词 ... garble 曲解，窜改 garbled 篡改的；曲解的 gardenia 栀子花.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... garble 曲解，窜改 garbled 引起误解的；窜改的 gardenia 栀子花.

list.abs: a garbled report of a speech ., 一篇曲解演说的报导.
带框 tape frame纸带孔损 tape garble带组 tape group
She garbled all the historical facts ., 她歪曲了所有历史事实.
电脑名词译名 ... garbage signal 废料信号 garbled message 错乱讯息 garden path sentence 花园路径句子.
garbled... ... garbled statement 错用语句 garbled message 【计】 错乱信息, 错乱报文 garbled extracts 窜改过的摘录,断章取义.

entry.tran: （信息或报告）混乱不清的，杂乱无章的，内容有误的
entry.def: A garbled message or report contains confused or wrong details, often because it is spoken by someone who is nervous or in a hurry.

example.ex: The Coastguard needs to decipher garbled messages in a few minutes.
example.tran: 海岸警卫队需要在几分钟内解读这些含混不清的信息。

example.ex: ...his own garbled version of the El Greco story.
example.tran: 他对艾尔·格列柯生平的歪曲描述

sentences.sentence: "a confused dream about the end of the world"

auth_sentence.content: It was much better to hear the truth than a garbled version.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was much better to hear the truth than a garbled version.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was much better to hear the truth than a garbled version.

auth_sentence.content: The telemetry was accompanied by a garbled transmission that sounded like fire.
auth_sentence.res_content: The telemetry was accompanied by a garbled transmission that sounded like fire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The telemetry was accompanied by a garbled transmission that sounded like fire.

auth_sentence.content: Someone appears to be misinformed, or some information must be garbled.
auth_sentence.res_content: Someone appears to be misinformed, or some information must be garbled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Someone appears to be misinformed, or some information must be garbled.
